${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Steamroll.NAME: Steamroll
${modID}:Steamroll.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Block. NL (Deal !${modID}:blockrn! damage).

${modID}:Here_Goes_Nothing.NAME: Here Goes Nothing
${modID}:Here_Goes_Nothing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself.

${modID}:Prep_Time.NAME: Prep Time
${modID}:Prep_Time.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

${modID}:Nuke.NAME: Nuke
${modID}:Nuke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, then the cost of this card increases by 1 permanently.

${modID}:Pacifism.NAME: Pacifism
${modID}:Pacifism.DESCRIPTION: If you do not play an attack this turn, NL gain !B! at the end of your turn.

${modID}:Earthquake.NAME: Earthquake
${modID}:Earthquake.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack ANY enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fragility.NAME: Fragility
${modID}:Fragility.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!. NL If you take any damage this turn, immediately die

${modID}:Defensive Investment.NAME: Defensive Investment
${modID}:Defensive Investment.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 ${modID}:Exposed to yourself. NL After every round, gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:Forge.NAME: Forge
${modID}:Forge.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, NL choose one card to Upgrade.

${modID}:Crunch Time.NAME: Crunch Time
${modID}:Crunch Time.DESCRIPTION: Do !D! damage X times. NL Draw X fewer cards next turn.
